channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8381] Update hive version on trunk to 0.15
item.description: In view of the branching for 0.14 done, we need to upgrade the version of hive on trunk to 0.15.
item.summary: Update hive version on trunk to 0.15

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: brocknoland Updated version of trunk.
vikram.dixit this has to be done all poms in the repo.
My bad. Partial patch. Version 2 updates all poms.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12673531/HIVE-8381.2.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12673531
Hmm I see a bunch of poms missing from the patch. ql, itest, etc.
brocknoland Could we wait the release of the RC before changing version on trunk?

No we should not wait. The reason is that we have two artifacts in our maven repos called 0.14 which are actually from completely different branches. The name should be changed immediately upon branch. We are actually behind the 8-ball here.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

You need to update itests as well.

Itests were missed. There should be an easier way to do this 

mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=0.15.0-SNAPSHOT -DgenerateBackupPoms=false
